title: AIEd-Driven Educational System Innovation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Technology and Artificial Intelligence Concepts
context.additional_context: AIEd competency enhancement program for corporate managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three roles of AIEd: new subject matter, direct mediator, and auxiliary tool.
Learners can analyze AIEd research trends using systematic literature review methodologies.
Learners can propose three AIEd implementation strategies suitable for corporate training environments.
Learners can evaluate the impact of AIEd on teaching-learning relationships from a complexity theory perspective.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
